metadata.dc:author: Flandes Aldeyturriaga, Javier
Reyes, Raquel López
Meléndez, Rocío Ibañez
Gómez, Erika Tavera
metadata.dc:description: In the last decade, major advances have been made in interventional bronchoscopy. Notable techniques are tracheobronchial laser, endoprosthesis placement and endobronchial ultrasound bronchoscopy. The indications and applications for these three bronchoscopic techniques are reviewed. I.
metadata.dc:title: Broncoscopia intervencionista.
[Interventional bronchoscopy].
